title: Relaunch schriftgestaltung.de
content:
I’m proud to announce the relaunch of [schriftgestaltung.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108210935/http:/schriftgestaltung.de/). Now the site focuses on tools for type designers.

[ 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108210935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schriftgestaltung_6000.png)
 ](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108210935/http:/schriftgestaltung.de/)

It presents information about the font editor "Glyphs", a QuickLook plugin .UFO files and a growing selection of scripts for FontLab and InDesign.

You are invited to take a look around.
author: schriftgestalt

comments.content:
Hi Georg!

This is great.  
The .UFO QuickLook plugin is just awesome!

Thanks
great job Georg! Looking forward seeing how this all develops
Wicked mate. Glyphs is pure gold.
